thread.title: wonderful experience
thread.title_full: wonderful experience - Review of The Standard, High Line, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: alrosel
title: wonderful experience
text:
We spent just one night at standard hight line for the 40's birthday of my husband. I sent en email before our arrive in order to inform the hotel about this event. All the staff was perfect and everyone worked in order to made this experience unforgettable. A special thanks to Colleen, Andrea and Tom for their attentions and warm welcome. The hotel is wonderful too. We were in the corner studio room at the 14th floor. The decoration is just perfect, a great balance between sobriety and comfort. A great design hotel where you fell at home thanks to their great staff! Just hope to come back
Room Tip: corner studio Hudson view, just amazing See more room tips
